creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: woodblock printed book with pages of text; a chart; images of musicians performing; of a dragon chasing men while another figure looks on from a hut; a dissection of the parts of instruments; of figures playing games and instruments; cover is light gray with green and brown design of pinecones and pine needles in lower half; pink title label; yellow label on front cover
markings: Marks: on title label, in pencil: [204 / Vol I-A]; Marks inside cover page, URC, in pencil: [\"Seikyoku / Ruisan\" / I-A]; Seal inside first page, LRC: [Settei]
medium: Woodblock printed book; ink and color on paper
title: Encyclopedia of  Musical Theater Performances (Seikyoku ruisan 声曲類纂), vol. 1
